wav_format.h

00001 #ifndef _PARS_WAV_H
00002 #define _PARS_WAV_H
00003 /*
00004  * WAV parser.
00005  * Parses a WAV file image from an in-memory image.
00006  *
00007  * Author: Phil Burk
00008  * @author Phil Burk, Copyright 2002 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL
00009  */
00010 
00011 #ifdef __cplusplus
00012 extern "C"
00013 {
00014 #endif
00015 
00016         /* Define WAV Chunk and FORM types as 4 byte integers. */
00017 #define RIFF_ID   (('R'<<24) | ('I'<<16) | ('F'<<8) | 'F')
00018 #define WAVE_ID   (('W'<<24) | ('A'<<16) | ('V'<<8) | 'E')
00019 #define FMT_ID    (('f'<<24) | ('m'<<16) | ('t'<<8) | ' ')
00020 #define DATA_ID   (('d'<<24) | ('a'<<16) | ('t'<<8) | 'a')
00021 #define FACT_ID   (('f'<<24) | ('a'<<16) | ('c'<<8) | 't')
00022 
00023         /* Errors returned by Audio_ParseSampleImage_WAV */
00024 #define WAV_ERR_CHUNK_SIZE     (-1)   /* Chunk size is illegal or past file size. */
00025 #define WAV_ERR_FILE_TYPE      (-2)   /* Not a WAV file. */
00026 #define WAV_ERR_ILLEGAL_VALUE  (-3)   /* Illegal or unsupported value. Eg. 927 bits/sample */
00027 #define WAV_ERR_FORMAT_TYPE    (-4)   /* Unsupported format, eg. compressed. */
00028 #define WAV_ERR_TRUNCATED      (-5)   /* End of file missing. */
00029 
00030         /* WAV PCM data format ID */
00031 #define WAVE_FORMAT_PCM        (1)
00032 #define WAVE_FORMAT_IMA_ADPCM  (0x0011)
00033 
00034 #ifdef __cplusplus
00035 };
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #endif /* _PARS_WAV_H */
